divs: sighting detailsthis happened about 10 years ago or so and was the first of 3 sightings i've seen....obviously i don't recall exact dates or times.... i had gone to a late afternoon matinee with a friend. we returned to my home about 7pm. as we got out of my car i noticed a copper-colored cigar shaped\cylindrical object moving through the valley that runs alongside of my home. it was silent and moving very slowly. i turned to my friend and asked him what it was...he said, "exactly what you think it is..." i watched it for about another 5-10 secs before i lost sight of it. it was very surreal and i wasn't sure what to think about what i saw...
